name: places/ChIJY3ps6xb2wokR58QjPD4b6fk
formattedAddress: 2142 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10026, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2142 Frederick Douglass Blvd, New York, NY 10026-2306, USA

originalText.text: I went in expecting a decent service, it was way too overpriced, she got acrylic all over my nail and finger. She also had the e-file on the highest setting the whole time and when she was almost done she cut me and I started bleeding immediately and she didn’t even say sorry. I am terrified that if I hit my nail on something it would take off my natural nail because of how bonded my skin is to the acrylic. If I could give no stars I could, I am so disappointed.

originalText.text: They really don’t know how to shape nails, I asked for coffin shaped nails and they look so square and makes my nail look wide. They also  cut your skin while shaping. The only one who does a good job is the owner. But even so, their overpriced for the eh job that they do.

text.text: They really don’t know how to shape nails, I asked for coffin shaped nails and they look so square and makes my nail look wide. They also  cut your skin while shaping. The only one who does a good job is the owner. But even so, their overpriced for the eh job that they do.

originalText.text: They have bad attitudes, she made three of my fingers bleed while shaping my nails. My nail broke the same night i got them done & she was going to charge me to fix it. Its not worth the money. Definitely wont be going back.

originalText.text: They have terrible attitudes here and are over priced for the terrible work they do. I've never had a problem anywhere I go and here I've had several. I've given them plenty chances to prove me wrong and they have failed. I now understand why  they are always empty on a weekend. Do not waste your money here.

originalText.text: Okay so I been reading everyone comments and I feel like they are a great nail  salon is the fact that they just rush.i got my nails done today and they look so nice .you just have to be on top of them about everything they do.so if they not the shape right tell them so they could fix it .
